page.title: 14HILL OF TARVIT
page.content: The nature trail on the whole was fun to do because we got a lot of freedom and trust put in us .We found out about the lives of people gone by and the wildlife around the gardens such as{ladybirds,rooks,rabbits and roe {deer}(So I think).Our idea was to show children how to act sensibly in the countryside.The Treasure Trail goes round the gardens of Hill of Tarvit House.We looked for interesting features that were not obvious at a glance.After a couple of minutes the children relaxed and became more interested in the trail.The children also used the leaflets we made to their best advantage.We learned about the{Fife Hunt Ball in January 1930 by looking up the Dundee Courier and interviewing a guest who attended the Hunt Ball.
